channel.title: Help please~!
channel.description:
Searching in TUTS section i was not able to find a TUT for making a object and having it do a certain thing syuch as:
TELEING RAISEING EXPS BLOCKING ENTRAZE (EX: FIRES AROUND IN A STAR SHAPE BUY YOU CANT GET OUT "pk box"
Please respond~!

item.title: Help please~!
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

Its called a case

case OBJECT ID:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Your message!”);
sendMessage(“Your message”);
addItem(item id, amount);
actionTimer = 85;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((xp gained*playerLevel[skill id]), skill id);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

Read full topic
